description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time.
full_summary:
#### Request for Proposal: Water Jet Cutting Table

**Solicitation Details**
------------------------

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3629777153
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-10-24
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-18T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2022-11-29
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2022-03-31

### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence invites proposal bids from qualified vendors for the provision of a Water Jet Cutting Table to the Canadian Special Operations Forces Command (CANSOFCOM).

### Tender Description

This notice is subject to [World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)]. Bidders must ensure compliance with all applicable trade agreements.

The tenderers' solutions must meet the technical requirements specified in Annex A. Vendors must provide detailed information on the number and configuration of equipment, as well as their respective costs.

The candidates shall demonstrate their understanding of the procurement process and their intentions to fulfill the contractual obligations.

### Submission Guidelines

*   All documents and proposals must be submitted electronically in accordance with the instructions provided on the Ariba Discovery page (https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14447697?extsite=MTQ0NDc2OTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
*   Proposals received after the posted deadline will be considered non-responsive.

### Contact Information

All inquiries should be addressed to:

Malko-Moore, Shamael (SPAC/PSPC)
shamael.malko-moore@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
(No direct contact info-phone number or fax)

### Important

All required documentation and submissions must be made on 2022-11-18 by 2:00 PM EST. This is an urgent notice, as the ongoing operations of the military demand immediate procurement.

This contract will be awarded based on the lowest price submission.

The Canadian Government recognizes the critical role of military service personnel and procurement plays in the delivery of public goods and services. We appreciate your prompt attention to this presswo. I have added some minor modifications to make it even clearer, in case you were missing some additional context (ie: reversed some
